restaurants_bars.name: Xfinity Live!
restaurants_bars.description: A dining and entertainment complex located on the same sports complex as the stadium, offering multiple eateries, bars and venues for pre-game and post-game festivities.

restaurants_bars.name: Phillies Sports Bar & Grill
restaurants_bars.description: Located nearby the stadium, a classic sports bar with game-friendly specials and a lively Eagles fan crowd.

accommodations.name: Courtyard by Marriott South at The Navy Yard
accommodations.description: Located within a short drive of the venue, it offers free shuttle service to the stadium on game days.

accommodations.name: Holiday Inn Philadelphia Stadium
accommodations.description: Situated within walking distance of the stadium and offering special game day rates.

tourist_attractions.name: Liberty Bell Center
tourist_attractions.description: Historic site offering exhibits on the famous, iconic bell and its role in American history.

tourist_attractions.name: Philadelphia Museum of Art
tourist_attractions.description: Famous museum known for its diverse collections and the 'Rocky Steps' featured in the boxing film series.

team_related_activities.name: Eagles Pro Shop
team_related_activities.description: Get your official Eagles merchandise here, located within the stadium.

team_related_activities.name: Eagles Tailgate Party
team_related_activities.description: Join the local fans for traditional tailgating parties before each game in the stadium parking lot.

options.description: This subway line stops right at the stadium with trains running frequently on game days.
Uber has a dedicated pick-up and drop-off zone at the venue.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Consider purchasing season tickets if you plan to attend multiple games. Tickets for less high-profile teams or weekday games can also be cheaper. Look for resale tickets on trustworthy websites to find potential deals.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Buy from official sources or trusted resale platforms to ensure authenticity. Beware of prices that seem too good to be true or sellers that ask for wire transfers or cryptocurrencies.
